ACCOUNT.EQUITY: Accounts of equity and borrowing more than a year
ACCOUNT.EXP_PROD: Accounts other expenses and other products
ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account Management
ACCOUNT.HELP_TXT_2: Account information and relationships are shown in the table on the right
ACCOUNT.HELP_TXT_3: Click 'Add Account' to add an account
ACCOUNT.LABEL: Account Label
ACCOUNT.NOT_0_AS_ACCOUNT_NOMBER: You cannot set 0 as account number
ACCOUNT.ROOT_PARENT: This account is set as a child of the root account. This means it will be at the highest level in the chart of accounts.
ACCOUNT.RECORD_SAME: No changes have been made to the form. Update the account details and then press submit.
ACCOUNT.TYPE_CHANGE_BLOCKED: You cannot change the type of a title account with children.
ACCOUNT.CONFIRM_HIDE: Hiding an account removes the account from all account selection elements.  It will not affect any pending transactions using the account.  Make it hidden?
ACCOUNT.CONFIRM_UNHIDE: This account is currently hidden. Are you sure you want to reveal it for use?
ACCOUNT.CONFIRM_LOCK: Locking an account restrict the ability to post transactions using the account.  Are you sure you want to lock it?
ACCOUNT.CONFIRM_UNLOCK: The account is locked.  Unlocking it will allow transactions to be posted containing this account.  Are you sure you want to unlock it?

REFERENCE.RECORD_ERROR: An error occur during the submission
